mapper.sql: id, loan_id, corpus, default_interest, expected_interest, actual_interest, period, repay_date, actual_repay_date, status, created_time
mapper.select: select * from loan_repay where loan_id = #{loanId} order by period asc

select * from loan_repay enabled_repay where enabled_repay.loan_id = #{loanId} and ( (exists(select 1 from loan where loan.id = #{loanId} and status = 'REPAYING') and enabled_repay.status = 'REPAYING' and enabled_repay.period = (select min(period) from loan_repay future_repay where future_repay.loan_id = #{loanId} and date(future_repay.repay_date) >= date(now()))) or (exists(select 1 from loan where loan.id = #{loanId} and status = 'OVERDUE') and enabled_repay.status <> 'WAIT_PAY' and enabled_repay.period = (select min(period) from loan_repay future_repay where future_repay.loan_id = #{loanId} and date(future_repay.repay_date) >= date(now())) and exists(select 1 from loan_repay future_repay where future_repay.loan_id = #{loanId} and date(future_repay.repay_date) >= date(now()))) or (exists(select 1 from loan where loan.id = #{loanId} and status = 'OVERDUE') and enabled_repay.status = 'OVERDUE' and enabled_repay.period = (select count(1) from loan_repay where loan_repay.loan_id = #{loanId}) and not exists(select 1 from loan_repay future_repay where future_repay.loan_id = #{loanId} and date(future_repay.repay_date) >= date(now()))) )
select * from loan_repay where loan_id = #{loanId} and period = #{period}
select * from loan_repay where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'WAIT_PAY'

select * from loan_repay where loan_id = #{loanId} and loan_repay.period = (select min(period) from loan_repay future_repay join loan on future_repay.loan_id = loan.id where future_repay.loan_id = #{loanId} and date(now()) >= date(loan.recheck_time) and date(future_repay.repay_date) >= date(now()))
mapper.update: update loan_repay set expected_interest = #{expectedInterest}, repay_date = #{repayDate}, actual_interest = #{actualInterest}, actual_repay_date = #{actualRepayDate}, status = #{status}, default_interest = #{defaultInterest} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM( t.`corpus` + t.`default_interest` + t.`expected_interest` ),0) FROM loan_repay t JOIN loan l ON t.`loan_id` = l.`id` AND l.`status` != 'COMPLETE' AND l.`agent_login_name` = #{loginName} WHERE t.`status` IN ( 'REPAYING', 'WAIT_PAY', 'OVERDUE' ) AND t.`repay_date` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT m.`id` as`loan_id`, m.`name`, m.`base_rate`, m.`activity_rate`, m.`periods`, n.`period`, n.`status` AS `loan_repay_status`, n.`corpus`, n.`actual_interest`, n.`expected_interest`, n.`default_interest`, n.`actual_repay_date`, n.`repay_date`, n.`id` as `loan_repay_id`, m.`type` FROM `loan` m JOIN ( SELECT t.`id`, l.`id` AS `loanId`, t.`period`, t.`status`, t.`corpus`, t.`actual_interest`, t.`expected_interest`, t.`default_interest`, t.`actual_repay_date`, t.`repay_date`, t.`repay_date` AS `repayTime` FROM `loan_repay` t JOIN `loan` l ON t.`loan_id` = l.`id` AND l.`status` != 'COMPLETE' AND l.`agent_login_name` = #{loginName} WHERE t.`status` IN ( 'REPAYING', 'WAIT_PAY', 'OVERDUE' ) AND t.`repay_date` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) n ON n.loanId = m.`id` ORDER BY n.`repayTime` desc LIMIT #{startLimit}, #{endLimit}
select IFNULL(max(period),0) from loan_repay where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'COMPLETE'

select lr.expected_interest + lr.corpus + lr.default_interest as repay_amount, l.name as loan_name, u.mobile from loan_repay lr join loan l on l.id = lr.loan_id join user u on u.login_name = l.agent_login_name where lr.status='REPAYING' and date_format(lr.repay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d');
